definition: to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: I heard so many people are scared of offending the gods, only consult their own solutions to.
sentences.chinese: 我听见好多人都话惊得罪神灵，唯有自己谂办法解决。

sentences.english: Don't dream of reaching success by one step.
sentences.chinese: 要成功不好谂住一步登天。

sentences.english: Thee AIDS epidemic offers an example.
sentences.chinese: 谂艾滋病就是一个例子。

definition: used in transliteration
he (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 他[ta1]
some/few/a little (Cantonese)
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to look for (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 找[zhao3]
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
correct/suitable/to suit sb/just now (Cantonese)
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
indignant/generous/to sigh (with emotion)
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
to sleep (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 睡[shui4]
to confer on/to give to
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to look for (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 找[zhao3]
that (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 那[na4]
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to tie/to fasten/to button up
to connect/to arrest/to worry
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
system/department/faculty
